item.title: Bad Bunny Will Headline Super Bowl Halftime Show
item.description: The Latin superstar known for hits including “MIA,” “I Like It” and “Me Porto Bonito” will perform in February in Santa Clara, Calif.

item.title: New Ideas Emerge to End Gaza Conflict and Govern After War
item.description: As Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu of Israel and President Trump head into a meeting on Monday, new proposals are under discussion.

item.title: Which Federal Benefits and Services Continue During a Government Shutdown?
item.description: Without a deal in Congress by Tuesday, the government will run out of funding.
